item.title: Minecraft, Redstone, and Editing
item.description: Redstone Tech Redstone is one of the most creative and sophisticated areas in Minecraft. Player used redstone objects like piston, repeater, observer combined with slime and honey block built up logical circuits and various machineries. About Me My game ID is Runaway_Fancy. 6gt Roof Builder Chorus Flower Farm How to Use a Statistical Method to Analyze Random Tick in Minecraft and Its Application My Redstone-tech Server I launched a survival multiple player (SMP) server focusing on redstone technology under game version 1.

item.title: Seminar on Physics at the University of Macau
item.description: About The seminar on physics at the University of Macau (SPUM), founded by Yichen LIU and me, aims at improving the education of fundamental and advanced physics mathematics. Students who have strong and wide knowledge in a specific area can admit to being a lecturer. Our organization is unofficial therefore we only invite students who have interests and talents in physics and mathematics study and research. Students are required to have a strong basis in calculus, linear algebra, and differential equations (ordinary and partial).
